title: 93/144/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 March 1993 on certain protective measures in respect of salmon from Norway
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 March 1993 on certain protective measures in respect of salmon from Norway
(93/144/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit imports of salmon of the Salmo salar species originating in Norway, whether live or slaughtered in the non-eviscerated state.
Member States shall alter the measures the apply in trade in order to bring them into line with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision shall apply until 30 April 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
